document.full_text: iran's leaders say uprisings in the arab world were inspired by its 1979 revolution, but most ordinary iranians are too worn down by economic hardship to care about the export of their system of islamic rule.
document.title: hardship blunts iranian interest in arab protests
lines_and_colors: iran's leaders say uprisings in the arab world were inspired by its 1979 revolution, but most ordinary iranians are too worn down by economic hardship to care about the export of their system of islamic rule.
